name: Wayfinder (itch) (superduperpacman42)
description:
Play as a sentient GPS device, intent on destroying humanity in any way you can. At the moment, that means making your driver late for everything by taking the longest, slowest route you can find to the destination. Use the arrow keys to send directional commands to the driver, but be careful - they will start to catch on if you keep retracing your steps.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50 (theme: Delay the inevitable).
